    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15400</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">L'incantevole Finlandia e la sua capitale Helsinki</string>
            <string language="en">Enchanting Finland and Its Capital Helsinki</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verzauberndes Finnland und sein Haupthelsinki</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Finlande enchantante et son Helsinki capital</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Finland enchanting e sua Helsínquia importanta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γοητευτική Φινλανδία και κύριο Ελσίνκι του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Finlandia que encanta y su Helsinki capital</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Quanto bene conosci la Finlandia e la sua capitale Helsinki? Ti piacerebbe partire per un tour virtuale? Questo LO interdisciplinare sulla Finlandia e la sua capitale Helsinki lo rendono possibile per te</string>
            <string language="en">How well do you know Finland and its capital Helsinki?
Would you like to go on a virtual visit? These cross-curricular learning objects on Finland and its capital Helsinki make it all possible for you.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">stagioni</string>
            <string language="en">seasons</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie gut kennen Sie Finnland und sein Kapital 
Helsinki?Would, das Sie auf einen virtuellen Besuch gehen mögen? 
Diese Kreuzlehrplanerlernennachrichten auf Finnland und seinem 
Haupthelsinki ermöglichen es ganz für Sie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">À quel point connaissez-vous la Finlande et son 
capital Helsinki?Would que vous aimez aller sur une visite virtuelle ?
Ces objets d'étude croix-curriculaires sur la Finlande et son 
Helsinki capital le rendent tout possible à vous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como bem você sabe Finland e seu capital 
Helsinki?Would que você gosta de ir em uma visita virtual? 
Estes objetos de aprendizagem cruz-cross-curricular em Finland e
em sua Helsínquia importanta fazem toda possível para você.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόσο καλά ξέρετε τη Φινλανδία και κύριο 
Helsinki?Would της που επιθυμείτε να πάτε σε μια εικονική 
επίσκεψη; Αυτά τα διαγώνιος-διδακτικά αντικείμενα 
εκμάθησης στη Φινλανδία και το κύριο Ελσίνκι του το κάνουν όλα 
πιθανά για σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Usted sabe cómo bien Finlandia y su capital 
Helsinki?Would que usted tiene gusto de ir en una visita virtual? 
Estos objetos que aprenden cruz-del plan de estudios en 
Finlandia y su Helsinki capital hacen todo posible para usted.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jahreszeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">saisons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estações</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εποχές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estaciones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo learning object interdisciplinare è inteso per gruppi di età tra i 12 e i 18 anni, ma naturalmente esso può essere anche usato da chiunque abbia interesse per la Finlandia. Potete usare il materiale com'è o svilupparlo ulteriormente in una webquest  secondo le richieste del curriculum e il livello degli studenti</string>
            <string language="en">These cross-curricular learning objects are intended for age group 12-18 but of course they can also be used by anyone who is interested in Finland. You can just use the material as it is or further develop it into a webquest depending on the curricular requirements and the level of the students.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
